faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to your concerns
faq.q1.question: Can I manage the website myself?
faq.q1.answer: Yes, you get video instructions and the system is as simple as using Facebook. You don't need to be technical to add a blog post or change content yourself.
faq.q2.question: Why not Wix/SaaS?
faq.q2.answer: Because on Wix you're not the owner of your site. With me, you have sovereignty – your code, your data, your server. You don't pay monthly subscriptions that grow with every new feature.
faq.q3.question: Do you issue invoices?
faq.q3.answer: Of course, I operate legally and pay taxes in Poland. You receive full accounting documentation and can deduct VAT.
